data_table.description: MESA Ancillary Study Dataset: MESA Classic measures of serum and urinary concentrations of mineral metabolism markers incuding Vitamin D, potassium, sodium, calcium, phosphorus, and others.

variable.name: sidno
variable.comment: Serum and urine concentrations of mineral metabolism markers were measured at baseline in participants with available stored serum and spot urine samples, respectively. Nutrient intakes were estimated from food frequency questionnaires administered at baseline.

variable.name: annd25c1
variable.description: ANNUALIZED SERUM CONCENTRATION OF 25-HYDROXYVITAMIN D 25OHD ng/mL
variable.comment: The variable annualized serum 25OHD (annd25) was predicted using a cosinor model to account for seasonal variation in measurement, and is used to derive annual 25OHD concentrations and estimate 25OHD levels at every month of the year. In the cosinor model, the time variable t month is transformed as r = cos{2pi/12} * t and s = sin{2pi/12} * t, which are then fit as predictors of 25OHD in a linear model. The coefficients beta_r and beta_s of the r and s predictors are transformed to give the amplitude: amplitude = sqrt (beta_r^2 + beta_s^2) and phase shift shift = arctan{beta_r/beta_s} of the sine curve. The annual mean is the intercept term of the model.

variable.name: fgfc1
variable.description: SERUM CONCENTRATION OF FIBROBLAST GROWTH FACTOR-23 FGF-23 pg/mL

variable.name: pthc1
variable.description: SERUM CONCENTRATION OF PARATHYROID HORMONE PTH pg/mL

variable.name: uureac1
variable.description: URINE CONCENTRATION OF BLOOD UREA NITROGEN BUN mg/dL

variable.name: uuricc1
variable.description: URINE CONCENTRATION OF URIC ACID mg/dL
